scripts.startSetup: npm i && echo DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN="" > .TEST && echo HYPIXEL_API_KEY="" >> .TEST
scripts.poststartSetup: echo[  && echo Add your own Discord Bot Token and Hypixel Api Key to the .env file before running "npm run start" && echo[
scripts.simpleview: echo { "files.exclude": { "node_modules/": true,        "package-lock.json": true,        ".env": false,        "package.json": true,        "src/handlers": true,        "src/events": true,        "src/index.js": true,        ".vscode/": true,        ".utils/templates/": true, }} >> .vscode/settings.json
